title: Harlan's Crossing
description: Colorado Territory 1873: Ethan Cobb continues his search for the men who murdered his brother. Chasing a possible clue to the whereabouts of the ruthless gang, he finds himself in Harlanâ€™s Crossing - a dying town with little hope of survival. Can the solitary Marshal save not only the town but the small family who have taken him to their hearts, and will he find something more important than justice and revenge?The Lawman Ethan Cobb series is a Western trilogy with an overarching romance plot, though each book has its own story arc with satisfying endings.
author: Leona Grace
